column5: Only a couple of hours here before Santa puts an appearance, a chance to wish all OFNers happy holidays and a healthy 2007.  The picture was taken just now, the residents collect from their visitors and all the proceeds go to the Eastbourne lifeboat crew.    RNLI (Royal National Lifeboat Institute) lifeboats are crewed by volunteers who turn out at a moments notice in all sorts of weather, lets hope their Christmas and all emergency services wherever they are is a quiet one.  Best wishes to you and of your families from us all, Mick
Nice display & great to hear from you, Mick!  All the best to you & yours....
Happy Holidays Britmick.  Going to be getting a new cross stitch for Christmas again this year?  All the best to you and yours.  Joey
Lol Joey, this house does not need anymore cross stitch in it  the problem I have is trying to convince Angela  Best wishes, Mick
I'm with Angela, no house can ever have enough Cross Stitches in them  Cheers.  Joey
Merry Christmas Mick. I hope you and the family have a great holiday season.  Mike
Merry Christmas to you and your family,  Mick.  Best wishes for a Happy New Year to those over 'ome.
Merry xmas brit.  hope you have a good one and all the best for 2007.
